stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
Compare the relationship between social cleavages and political legitimacy in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following.

(a) Define the concept of a social cleavage.

(b) Describe two different examples of a politically relevant social cleavage, each one within a different AP Comparative Government and Politics course country.

(c) Explain how the social cleavages either strengthen or undermine political legitimacy for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in part (b).
